Seo.title: NeoCraft - Digital Agency: Web, Mobile, Design & SEO
Seo.description: Digital agency : web development, mobile apps, design, SEO, training. International team expertise. Free consultation.
Seo.keywords: web development, digital agency, e-commerce, UI/UX design, technical consulting, web development training

openGraph.description: Tailored digital solutions and high-quality technical training

twitter.description: The web innovation for digital success.

jsonLd.description: NeoCraft is a digital agency specialized in web development offering customized solutions to meet your specific project needs and requirements.

Hero.badge: The web innovation for digital success
Hero.p: Designed with a thoughtful approach, we practice what we preach. The result is a website that is accessible to all, loads in the blink of an eye and minimises the amount of carbon emitted each time a page is loaded.

element1.title: Our Vision
element1.description: We create sustainable social, environmental and economic value by working for digital and human progress. Contributing to these three dimensions of sustainable development has always been at the heart of our activities.

element2.title: Our Mission
element2.description: Democratising technical excellence by combining craftsmanship and technological innovation. We create digital solutions that turn ideas into reality and train the talent of tomorrowDemocratising technical excellence by combining traditional know-how with technological innovation. We create digital solutions that turn ideas into reality and train the talent of tomorrow.

value1.title: Excellence
value1.description: We aim for excellence in every line of code and every pixel of design.

value2.title: Collaboration
value2.description: We work closely with our customers to create tailor-made solutions.

value3.title: Innovation
value3.description: We are constantly exploring new technologies to stay at the cutting edge.

value4.title: Commitment
value4.description: We respect our commitments in terms of deadlines, budget and quality.

Services.title: Tailored services
Services.description: Comprehensive services to support your digital transformation and help you achieve your objectives.

card1.title: Web Development
card1.description: Custom web applications to perfectly meet your specific needs and technical requirements.

card2.title: Custom UI/UX
card2.description: Elegant interfaces and optimal user experiences that capture attention and convert your visitors.

card3.title: Technical Consulting
card3.description: Tailored training programmes to develop your teams' technical skills.

card4.title: Project support
card4.description: Full support from design to delivery with an agile and transparent methodology.

iServices.title: Our services
iServices.description: Our agency combines entrepreneurial spirit and digital skills to provide you with marketing tools tailored to your budget. You benefit from someone who monitors the progress of your website development and assists you with your communication strategy.
iServices.p: Select an agency division below to discover the services it offers.

customDevelopment.title: Custom Web Development
customDevelopment.description: A website is often the driving force behind a company's growth, but it is also an essential management tool for your business. Every day, you use different software to update your inventory with your shop, track your business opportunities, and manage your invoices and suppliers. But do they really fit your working methods?
customDevelopment.details: To improve performance and optimise the return on investment of your applications, it is essential for your teams to have access to the right technologies. At NeoCraft, we develop web platforms that are fully tailored to the specific needs of your organisation. Some of our clients have gained two weeks of work per year per employee thanks to the design of a customised CRM system.
customDevelopment.cta: Grow your business with a web platform tailored to your needs!

ecommerce.title: E-commerce websites
ecommerce.description: Create your online shop with a comprehensive and powerful e-commerce solution. We develop sales platforms tailored to your industry with all the features you need to maximise your conversions.
ecommerce.details: Our expertise in e-commerce allows us to create tailor-made solutions that are perfectly suited to your products and your customers. Inventory management, secure payments, deliveries‚Äîwe take care of everything.
ecommerce.cta: Launch your online shop and boost your sales today!

showcase.title: Showcase websites
showcase.description: Showcase your business with an elegant and professional website. We create websites that perfectly reflect your brand image and convert your visitors into customers.
showcase.details: An effective showcase website must combine aesthetics and performance. We design fast, responsive websites that are optimised for natural referencing in order to maximise your online visibility.
showcase.cta: Create your online presence with a showcase website that reflects who you are!

seo.title: SEO referencing
seo.description: Improve your visibility on search engines with our SEO expertise. We optimise your website so that it appears on the first page of Google results and attracts more qualified visitors.
seo.details: Our SEO approach combines technique and content for lasting results. Technical audits, keyword research, on-page optimisation and content strategy: we do everything we can to improve your ranking.
seo.cta: Dominate search results and attract more customers !

social-media.title: Social media
social-media.description: Grow your social media presence with a strategy tailored to your audience. We create and manage your accounts to engage your community and build your brand awareness.
social-media.details: Social media has become essential for reaching your audience. We develop a personalised social media strategy and create engaging content to grow your community.
social-media.cta: Engage your audience and grow your online community!

advertising.title: Online advertisement
advertising.description: Maximise your return on investment with targeted advertising campaigns. Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads ‚Äì we optimise your budgets to generate more leads and sales.
advertising.details: Online advertising can deliver rapid results when done right. We create and optimise your campaigns to maximise your ROI and achieve your business goals.
advertising.cta: Generate more leads with effective advertising campaigns !

strategy.title: Digital strategy
strategy.description: Define a digital strategy that is consistent with your business objectives. We support you in the digital transformation of your company with a personalised approach and concrete recommendations.
strategy.details: An effective digital strategy requires a comprehensive view of your ecosystem. We analyse your market, your competitors and your objectives to develop a tailor-made digital roadmap.
strategy.cta: Accelerate your digital transformation with a tailor-made strategy !

training.title: Technical training
training.description: Train your teams in the latest web technologies and best practices. Our customised training courses enable your employees to develop their skills and become more autonomous.
training.details: We offer training courses tailored to your level and specific needs. From beginner to advanced, our experts share their expertise with a practical and operational approach.
training.cta: Invest in your teams' skills for the future !

audit.title: Audit & optimization
audit.description: Identify areas for improvement in your digital presence with a comprehensive audit. We analyse your current performance and offer concrete solutions to optimise your results.
audit.details: A thorough audit often reveals significant opportunities for improvement. We scrutinise every aspect of your digital presence to identify the most relevant growth drivers.
audit.cta: Optimise your digital performance with a professional audit !

Methodology.title: NeoCraft Methodology
Methodology.description: A proven 5-step process to ensure the success of your projects and seamless collaboration.

step1.title: Discovery
step1.description: In-depth analysis of your needs, objectives and constraints to determine the best approach.

step2.title: Design & prototype
step2.description: Creative design and interactive prototyping to visualise and test your solution before development.

step3.title: Agile development
step3.description: Iterative development with short cycles to quickly adapt to feedback and changes.

step4.title: Tests & QA
step4.description: Rigorous validation and performance optimisation to guarantee impeccable quality.

step5.title: Delivery + tracking
step5.description: Controlled deployment and training of your teams for a smooth transition and rapid autonomy.

Testimonial.title: What people say about us
Testimonial.description: Discover how we have helped our clients achieve their goals through our expertise and personalised approach.

testimonial1.quote: NeoCraft transformed our vision into an exceptional application. Their artisanal approach and attention to detail made all the difference. A trusted partner for the future.

testimonial2.quote: A passionate team that delivers high-quality solutions. Their technical expertise and ability to understand our business challenges have enabled us to accelerate our digital transformation.

testimonial3.quote: High-level technical training that transformed our team. Our developers gained autonomy and efficiency thanks to NeoCraft's educational approach.

testimonial4.quote: The attention to detail and innovative features have completely transformed our workflow. This is exactly what we've been looking for.

testimonial5.quote: Implementation was seamless and the results exceeded our expectations. The platform's flexibility is remarkable.

testimonial6.quote: Exceptional human and technical support. NeoCraft listened to our ecological constraints to offer a sober and powerful web solution.

testimonial7.quote: Security was our top priority. NeoCraft's expertise in secure backend architecture allowed us to launch our platform with complete peace of mind.

testimonial8.quote: Working with developers who understand UI/UX challenges is a luxury. NeoCraft's code respects every pixel of our designs.

testimonial9.quote: The team's agility was crucial for our launch. They were able to pivot with us without ever sacrificing code quality.

progressiveContactForm.title: Let's discuss your project
progressiveContactForm.description: Ready to get started on your project? Contact us to discuss your needs and find out how we can help.

formStepTitle.name: What would you like us to call you?

formData.time: Typical response time: less than 24 hours

call.title: Ready to get started?
call.description: Book a time slot in our calendar to discuss your project in detail.

cta.description: Bring your digital vision to life with our craftsmanship skills.

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello. I am NeoBot, your virtual assistant. How can I help you?

Team.title: Digital Craftsmen
Team.description: A passionate team combining technical expertise and creative vision to bring your projects to life.

cedrick.bio: Visionary and technology enthusiast, Cedrick leads strategy and innovation at NeoCraft.

mj.bio: Expert in digital strategy and communication, MJ drives growth and visibility for NeoCraft.

jorel.bio: React and Node.js specialist, Jorel builds performant and elegant web applications.

stephane.bio: Creative and meticulous, Stephane transforms ideas into intuitive and modern interfaces.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and your personal data with the utmost transparency.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how NeoCraft collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website and services. By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies installed.

protection.title: Protection & Sharing
protection.noSaleContent: NeoCraft never sells, rents, or exchanges your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have full control over your data:
rights.how: Contact us at privacy@neocraft.dev to exercise your rights.

Realisations.title: Our Work
Realisations.description: Discover how we transform complex ideas into exceptional digital experiences.

Outils.title: Our Precision Tools
Outils.description: We use the most advanced technologies to ensure performance, security, and scalability for your projects.

frontend.title: Frontend & Design
frontend.description: Fluid interfaces with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS for an exceptional user experience.

backend.title: Backend & Cloud
backend.description: Robust infrastructure with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Vercel for rock-solid stability.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Integrating AI tools like OpenAI and Claude to automate and optimize your workflows.

CTA.title: Let's bring
CTA.subtitle: your project to life
CTA.description: Let's transform your vision into an exceptional digital solution together. Contact us to discuss your project.

Booking.title: Schedule a free consultation
Booking.description: Let's discuss your project during a 30-minute call.

WhatsApp.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions.
WhatsApp.defaultMessage: Hello! I'd like to learn more about your services.

CookieConsent.title: We use cookies üç™
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.

necessary.title: Essential cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site (Google Analytics, Clarity).

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.
